MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH63 postcode area of Bebington, affecting properties in Kingswood Boulevard and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.45AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.16PM on 17th April 2021.
